name: Robbery (MarcTheDev)
description:
Robbery is an endless driving game where you avoid obstacles to stay alive and try to collect as much cash as possible.

If playing on browser, I highly recommend playing in fullscreen (can be accessed in settings)

Directions:

  • A and D or arrow keys to move
  • Esc or p to pause game
  • 1 to switch to first person
  • 3 to switch to third person (game starts in third person)
